title: Lean Crust Pizza
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. You can order any pizza vegan or gluten free (or both). Always has slices with vegan cheese, plus you can order whole vegan pizzas. Has many toppings. Gluten free crust is made with quinoa flour. A few small tables inside. Near the performing arts district and Barclay's Center.
